\begin{tikzcd}
&&& {\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F} \\
&& {\pi (\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F)} && {(\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F)[\mathsf{Weq}^{-1}]} \\
{\,} &&& {\frac{\mathscr C\cap \mathscr F}{\mathscr C\cap \mathscr W \cap \mathscr F}} &&& {\,}
\arrow["\pi"', from=1-4, to=2-3]
\arrow["{\text{Localised}}", from=1-4, to=2-5]
\arrow["{\text{Stablised}}"{description}, from=1-4, to=3-4]
\arrow["\cong", tail reversed, from=2-5, to=3-4]
\arrow["{???}", dashed, from=3-4, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
